meanings.definition: A contagious disease affecting horses, characterized by swelling and inflammation of the testicles.
meanings.sent1: The vet diagnosed the horse with dourines after noticing the swollen testicles.
meanings.sent2: Farmers take precautions to prevent the spread of dourines among their horses.
meanings.sent3: The horse joked with the other animals, saying he caught dourines from a contaminated carrot.
meanings.sent4: The ranch was in chaos, the dourines spreading like wildfire among the stallions.
meanings.sent5: The image of the horse with dourines stuck in the minds of the stable workers.

meanings.definition: A disease of cattle, causing inflammation of the testicles.
meanings.sent1: The farmer isolated the bull with dourines to prevent the other cattle from getting sick.
meanings.sent2: The veterinarian treated the cow with dourines promptly to ease its discomfort.
meanings.sent3: The cows teased the bull with dourines, calling him 'Mr. Swollen' in good humor.
meanings.sent4: The farm was in turmoil, the dourines outbreak affecting the entire herd.
meanings.sent5: The sight of the bull with dourines lingered in the minds of the farmhands.

meanings.definition: A disease of sheep, causing inflammation of the testicles.
meanings.sent1: The shepherd recognized the symptoms of dourines in the ram and separated him from the flock.
meanings.sent2: The flock was vaccinated to prevent the spread of dourines among the sheep.
meanings.sent3: The sheep giggled at the ram with dourines, joking that he must have eaten a spicy weed.
meanings.sent4: The pasture was in disarray, the dourines outbreak causing concern among the ewes.
meanings.sent5: The vision of the ram with dourines etched itself in the memories of the shepherds.
